definition: to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
station/to stand/to halt/to stop/branch of a company or organization/website

sentences.english: The powerhouse is designed to be of shaft and semi-underground type and the substation of open type.
sentences.chinese: 廠房採用豎井半地下式佈置，開敞式變電站。

sentences.english: In this paper, an on-line monitoring device for fast transient overvoltages on substations is designed.
sentences.chinese: 本文設計了一個變電站瞬時過電壓在線監測系統。

sentences.english: An intelligent equipment which can transmit degrees of ammeters in power system is designed.
sentences.chinese: 設計了一種用於電力變電站的智能抄表裝置。

sentences.english: The substation equipped with a transformer of 500 KVA is at the south of the plant.
sentences.chinese: 在工程的南邊有一座裝有五百千伏安變電器的變電站。

sentences.english: The system has been put into use in Changsha Mawangdui Unatended Substation.
sentences.chinese: 該系統已在長沙馬王堆無人值班變電站投入運行。

sentences.english: This paper studies the model of each element in Tang Yin substation.
sentences.chinese: 本文在分析了湯陰變電站各元件的諧波參數。

sentences.english: Problem is also encountered in connections between underground lines and substations.
sentences.chinese: 地下電纜線路與變電站聯接時還會碰到問題。

sentences.english: An insulated conductor forming part of the return circuit and connecting the rest of the re-turn circuit to the substation.
sentences.chinese: 形成部分迴流且連接變電站其餘迴路的絕緣導線。

sentences.english: It is well known that substations are the key of power transmission system .
sentences.chinese: 衆所周知，變電站是輸配電系統中的重要環節。

sentences.english: This paper introduces the application of CANbus network in substation automation system SAS .
sentences.chinese: 介紹了CAN總線在變電站自動化系統中的實際應用。

sentences.english: Usually, there is no interconnection between the circuits energized by the various substations.
sentences.chinese: 通常，由不同變電站送電的線路之間無相互聯接。

sentences.english: The power failure took a toll on two traction substations along the Yingtan-Xiamen electric railway.
sentences.chinese: 停電影響鷹廈電氣化鐵路2個牽引變電站。

sentences.english: The sun sets over the Islington substation in Christchurch, New Zealand.
sentences.chinese: 落日的餘暉籠罩着新西蘭基督城的伊斯靈頓變電站。

sentences.english: Substations and periphery stations can have several user lines or branch channels.
sentences.chinese: 變電站等設外圍站可提供若干條用戶線或轉接通道。

sentences.english: In substations, Switching operation will give rise to transient overvoltage.
sentences.chinese: 在變電站內，開關的操作將產生瞬態過電壓。

sentences.english: This system has been running safely for 7 month, and achieved desired result.
sentences.chinese: 本系統在某縣三個變電站投運7個月以來，效果良好。

definition: a power station/an electricity generating plant
pipeline/general term for pipes, cables etc
monkey (dialect)/little monkey (affectionate term for children, subordinates)
